CutSceneText.Text: Listen carefully--I'll tell you where to find those three.
Chief Mate Menekiki is on the main deck.
You'll need his key to the Gun Deck, so kill him with the mobile cannon, nyerk.
On the Gun Deck, you'll find the Chief Gunner--
never far from his guns, akakakak!
Don't underestimate him, Daeva. He's hard as nails...and a deadly shot.
Much depends on you, brave Daeva. If you defeat these leaders,
only the captain remains. Use the cannon in the Gun Repairing Deck to get up to the captain's cabin.
My heartfelt hopes go with you, mighty Daeva. You're going to need them all, nyerk!
